lines.text: Okay, here's how he did it:
He took a Reversing Rune sticker, and put it on his chest backwards.
Right! So the sticky side is facing outwards!
...How's that make it look like a fake hole?
Well, vision works by having light bounce off something and into your eyes, right?
If a photon hit the sticker, and stuck, it'd try to bounce, but its direction would be reversed...
So it'd get trapped, and never reach your eye!
And that'd make it look like there was a dark black hole where the back of the sticker was!
That's- st-stickers can't stick to- photons are-
Well, how about you test that, then? If you're right, you touch the hole, and it sticks to your hand.
You go touch the bullet wound, and it definitely very much is, actually, for real, a hole and not a sticker and now you've got blood on your fingers, ew.
